description.narrative: The Partnership, Aid Effectiveness and Small Activities initiative supports the effectiveness and partnership of the Australian aid program in Vietnam, specifically: assistance to strengthen government-donor dialogue; workshops and conferences to promote policy dialogue, program learning, knowledge and information sharing; public diplomacy promotion through the development of communication products; support innovative ideas that address local development challenges through partnership with the World Bank, for example VID and VACI; small scale activities, reviews, appraisals and research as appropriate to emerging needs; consultancy work to support on-going activities; and additional volunteer placements and extensions. The total value of this initiative is $0.2 million for the 2011-12 financial year.
